tool_description: Adjusts prices dynamically based on inventory levels to optimize stock turnover and prevent overstock or stockout situations.

product_ids.description: Product SKUs to adjust pricing for

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All arrays must have equal length.
Invalid inventory data: Inventory levels and target levels must be non-negative.
Invalid sensitivity: adjustment_sensitivity must be between 0 and 1.
usage: Provide product_ids, current_prices, inventory_levels, and target_stock_levels. Adjust sensitivity to control how aggressively prices change with inventory levels.

adjustment_percentages.description: Percentage changes applied to original prices
